entry.title: ML Instant House Valuation: Part 1 - Analysis

link.title: ML Instant House Valuation: Part 1 - Analysis

entry.title: ML Instant House Valuation: Part 2 - Data Sourcing

link.title: ML Instant House Valuation: Part 2 - Data Sourcing

entry.summary: In this section, I will be collecting data from numerous sourcing and stitching them together in one dataset to use later for machine learning modelling. I will use open data from the HM Land Registry, and various other public sources.

entry.title: ML Instant House Valuation: Part 3 - Data exploration and transformation

link.title: ML Instant House Valuation: Part 3 - Data exploration and transformation

entry.summary: Now, I will take the data prepared in the previous section, and manipulate and transform the data into a format which can be understood by a machine learning model.

entry.title: ML Instant House Valuation: Part 4 - Model selection and implementation

link.title: ML Instant House Valuation: Part 4 - Model selection and implementation

entry.summary: I will test and train various machine learning models on the prepared dataset. The best model will be exported and used in the web-app development.
